citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:30 AM on 23
October 2023. Called both phone numbers for licensee after arriving at facility. Left a voicemail and reached the licensee
on the second call, not available to return to the facility at this time.
End Section

on the second call, not available to return to the facility at this time.
